trans-unit.source: Stateful Reliable Service Diagnostics
trans-unit.target: Stateful Reliable Service Diagnostics

trans-unit.source: Diagnostic Functionality for Stateful Reliable Services
trans-unit.target: Diagnostic Functionality for Stateful Reliable Services

trans-unit.source: The Stateful Reliable Services StatefulServiceBase class emits <linkText>EventSource</linkText><title></title> events that can be used for debugging the service, provide insights into how the runtime is operating and help with troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: The Stateful Reliable Services StatefulServiceBase class emits <linkText>EventSource</linkText><title></title> events that can be used for debugging the service, provide insights into how the runtime is operating and help with troubleshooting.

trans-unit.source: The EventSource name for Stateful Reliable Service StatefulServiceBase class is "Microsoft-ServiceFabric-Services".
trans-unit.target: The EventSource name for Stateful Reliable Service StatefulServiceBase class is "Microsoft-ServiceFabric-Services".

trans-unit.source: Events from this event source appear in the <linkText>Diagnostics Events</linkText><title></title> window when the service is being <linkText>debugged in Visual Studio</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Events from this event source appear in the <linkText>Diagnostics Events</linkText><title></title> window when the service is being <linkText>debugged in Visual Studio</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Service Fabric also offers the option of directing these events to <linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Service Fabric also offers the option of directing these events to <linkText>Application Insights</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For more information on this, please see the article on <linkText>Application Insights setup for Service Fabric</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on this, please see the article on <linkText>Application Insights setup for Service Fabric</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Other examples of tools and technologies that help in collecting and/or viewing EventSource events are <linkText>PerfView</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>Microsoft Azure Diagnostics</linkText><title></title> and the <linkText>Microsoft TraceEvent Library</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Other examples of tools and technologies that help in collecting and/or viewing EventSource events are <linkText>PerfView</linkText><title></title>, <linkText>Microsoft Azure Diagnostics</linkText><title></title> and the <linkText>Microsoft TraceEvent Library</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Event Name
trans-unit.target: Event Name

trans-unit.source: Event Id
trans-unit.target: Event Id

trans-unit.source: Level
trans-unit.target: Level

trans-unit.source: Event Description
trans-unit.target: Event Description

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncInvocation
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncInvocation

trans-unit.source: Informational
trans-unit.target: Informational

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task is started
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task is started

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncCancellation
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncCancellation

trans-unit.source: Informational
trans-unit.target: Informational

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task is cancelled
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task is cancelled

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncCompletion
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncCompletion

trans-unit.source: Informational
trans-unit.target: Informational

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task is completed
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task is completed

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation

trans-unit.source: Warning
trans-unit.target: Warning

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task takes too long to complete cancellation
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task takes too long to complete cancellation

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncFailure
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncFailure

trans-unit.source: Error
trans-unit.target: Error

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task throws an exception
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task throws an exception

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncInvocation, StatefulRunAsyncCompletion and StatefulRunAsyncCancellation events are useful to the service writer to understand the lifecycle of a service as well as the timing for when a service is started, cancelled and completed.
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncInvocation, StatefulRunAsyncCompletion and StatefulRunAsyncCancellation events are useful to the service writer to understand the lifecycle of a service as well as the timing for when a service is started, cancelled and completed.

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when debugging service issues or understanding the service lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: This can be useful when debugging service issues or understanding the service lifecycle.

trans-unit.source: Service writers should pay close attention to StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation and StatefulRunAsyncFailure events as they indicate issues with the service.
trans-unit.target: Service writers should pay close attention to StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation and StatefulRunAsyncFailure events as they indicate issues with the service.

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncFailure is emitted whenever the service RunAsync() task throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncFailure is emitted whenever the service RunAsync() task throws an exception.

trans-unit.source: Typically an exception thrown indicates an error or bug in the service.
trans-unit.target: Typically an exception thrown indicates an error or bug in the service.

trans-unit.source: Additionally the exception causes the service to fail and thus moved to a different node which can be an expensive operation and delay incoming requests while the service is moved.
trans-unit.target: Additionally the exception causes the service to fail and thus moved to a different node which can be an expensive operation and delay incoming requests while the service is moved.

trans-unit.source: Service writers should determine the cause of the exception and if possible mitigate it.
trans-unit.target: Service writers should determine the cause of the exception and if possible mitigate it.

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation is emitted whenever a cancellation request for the RunAsync task takes longer than 4 seconds.
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation is emitted whenever a cancellation request for the RunAsync task takes longer than 4 seconds.

trans-unit.source: When a service takes too long to complete cancellation, it impacts the ability for the service to be quickly restarted on another node and may impact overall availability of the service.
trans-unit.target: When a service takes too long to complete cancellation, it impacts the ability for the service to be quickly restarted on another node and may impact overall availability of the service.
